author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://kyonagashima.com/)
description: The source files of Hail2u (https://hail2u.net/) website
name: hail2u.net

scripts.deploy: npm run html && npm run feed && cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Build" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.postcss: cd dist && rm -fr css/ && mkdir css && cd .. && cp -rTu src/css/ dist/css/&& cp -rTu tmp/ dist/css/ && cp tmp/main.min.css src/partial/css.mustache && node bin/style-guide.js
scripts.postimg: cd dist && rm -fr img/ && mkdir img && cd.. && cp -rTu src/img/ dist/img/ && cp src/img/logo.svg src/partial/logo.mustache
scripts.postjs: cd dist && rm -fr js/ && mkdir js && cd .. && cp -rTu src/js/ dist/js/ && cp -rTu tmp/ dist/js/
scripts.postversion: git push origin master --tags && npm run deploy
scripts.precss: npm run test_css && npm run clear
scripts.prejs: npm run test_js && npm run clear
scripts.static: cp src/.nojekyll src/CNAME src/robots.txt dist/ && cp -rTu src/documents/ dist/documents/
scripts.test: npm run test_css && npm run test_js
scripts.version: npm run static && npm run img && npm run css && npm run js && npm run html -- --articles
